text: Cells were harvested and restimulated in the presence of immobilized anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 2 mug / ml ) plus anti - <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 2 mug / ml ) for 3 hr or immediately lysed .
RNA was extracted and reverse-transcribed and cDNA was analyzed for the expression of cytokines and transcription factors by real-time PCR assay as before ( Shoemaker et al . , 2006 ) .

Target gene mRNA expression was quantified either with SYBR Green ( Applied Biosystems ) or with Master Mix ( Applied Biosystems ) and normalized to <extra_id_0> ubiquitin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or <extra_id_0> HPRT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA levels , respectively .
